q: : He's having a blast in Boston. The Celtics big man, who last appeared on David Letterman 's show a decade ago, said he's been treated "fabulous" by C's fans. I live in a small town called Sudbury. Chris Bryant, who believes he may have been a victim of the phone hackers, said Friday he welcomed the decision to re-examine the case, adding that it should not have been closed last month. The evidence that this goes far deeper than one rotten apple has continued to stack up, and so a fresh pair of eyes looking at the case is very welcome, he said. Bryant said the police had "severely" damaged their credibility by failing to properly investigate earlier. Andy Coulson and the News of The World have denied the charges. OAKLAND
